patterns: Can you list down the hostel names at UTEM
What are the hostel names in UTEM
responses: We have Satria (Kasturi, Lekir, Lekiu, Jebat), Lestari, Al Jazari

patterns: What is the faculty that is available at UTEM?
responses: Six faculties which is FTMK,FKEKK,FKE,FTKM,FTKIP,FPTT

FKEKK stands for Fakulti Teknologi dan Kejuruteraan Elektronik dan Komputer. It is the Electronic (Computer) faculty at UTeM. FKEKK is located beside Kafe 1, Blue Building. For more info visit https://ftkek.utem.edu.my/
FKE stands for Fakulti Kejuruteraan Elektrik. It is the Electrical faculty at UTeM. FKE is located beside Kafe 1, Orange Building. For more info visit https://ftke.utem.edu.my/index.php/en/
FTKM stands for Fakulti Teknologi dan Kejuruteraan Mekanikal. It is the Mechanical faculty at UTeM. FTKM is located at Technology Campus. For more info visit https://ftkm.utem.edu.my/

FTKIP stands for Fakulti Teknologi dan Kejuruteraan Industri dan Pembuatan. It is the Manufacturing Engineering Faculty at UTeM. FTKIP is located in front of FTMK. For more info visit https://ftkip.utem.edu.my/

FTMK stands for Fakulti Teknologi Maklumat dan Komunikasi. It is the IT Faculty at UTeM. FTMK is located in front of UTeM Library, in the Yellow Building. For more information visit https://ftmk.utem.edu.my/web/

FPTT stands for Fakulti Pengurusan Teknologi dan Teknousahawanan. It is the Management & Technopreneurship Faculty at UTeM. FPTT is located at Technology Campus. For more information visit https://fptt.utem.edu.my/

patterns: What are the Facilities available at UTEM?
Tell me about the facilities at UTEM?
responses: We have Kompleks Sukan (Sports complex), Dewan Badminton (Badminton Court), Stadium to play football and jog on the track, Tasik UTEM where you can have a walk, Library where you can have your reading time

patterns: Can I bring a car to the campus?
Is bringing a car allowed for 1st and 2nd-year students?
What are the restrictions on bringing a car?
What is the entry time for the campus?
Can I enter the campus after midnight?
Are there any restrictions on going out after midnight?
Is cooking allowed in the hostel?
responses: For 1st and 2nd-year students, bringing a car to the campus is not allowed.The campus can be entered between 6 am to 12 am only.Going out and walking outside the campus is prohibited between 12 am to 6 am.Cooking is not allowed in the hostel.

patterns: Tell me about the cafes at UTEM
What is offered in Richiammo Cafe?
Tell me about He & She Coffee Shop
responses: There are 4 cafes at UTEM: Cafe Satria, Cafe Lestari, Cafe 1, and Cafe 2. Richiammo Cafe and He & She Coffee Shop are also available.

patterns: Is there a shuttle bus service at UTEM?
Tell me about the shuttle bus
From where does the shuttle bus operate?
How can I get the bus timetable?
responses: Shuttle bus service is available from Bus stop Satria and other bus stops around the campus.The bus goes to Kampus Teknologi and Kampus Induk. You can obtain the bus timetable from the telegram information page.

patterns: Is there a convenience store around the campus?
Tell me about the convenience stores at UTEM
How many convenience stores are there in Satria?
Are there convenience stores in both the main campus and technology campus?
responses: Yes, there is a few convenience store around the campus.There are many convenience stores in both the main campus and technology campus.

patterns: What services does the UTeM library offer?
Tell me about UTeM library resources
responses: The UTeM library provides a wide range of resources, including books, journals, and online databases. You can access these resources for academic research and study purposes.

patterns: Are there international exchange programs at UTeM?
Tell me about UTeM study abroad opportunities
responses: Yes, UTeM offers international exchange programs for students. Contact the international affairs office for details on studying abroad and exchange partnerships.

patterns: Are there health services available on campus?
Tell me about UTeM health facilities
responses: UTeM provides health services for students on campus. You can visit the health center for medical assistance or information about health and wellness programs.

patterns: How much are the tuition fees at UTeM?
Tell me about UTeM tuition costs
How much is the fees need to pay
responses: Tuition fees at UTeM vary depending on the program and other factors. For detailed information, please check the official UTeM website or contact the finance office.

patterns: Are there scholarships available at UTeM?
responses: Yes, UTeM offers various scholarships. You can find details on eligibility and application procedures on the official UTeM website or by contacting the scholarship office.

patterns: How can I apply for admission to UTeM?
Tell me about the admission process
responses: To apply for admission to UTeM, you can visit the official admissions portal on the university website. The process may vary for different programs, so be sure to follow the guidelines provided on the admissions page.

patterns: What is the Official UTeM Website?
Give me the link to the official UTeM website
responses: The official UTeM website is https://www.utem.edu.my/en/
